Package seng.monsters.model

package seng.monsters.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    seng.monsters
     
  • Class
    Description
    BattleManager
    Battle manager to handle battle between Trainer.
    BattleManager.UI
    The UI that provides callbacks at certain event during the match
    BattleManager.WhitedOutException
    Signals that the trainer no longer have any active (non-fainted) monster left
    Environment
    Environment about the field of battle
    GameManager
    The Game Manager that the model of the game
    Inventory
    A collection for item used by trainer
    Inventory.ItemNotExistException
    Signals that the caller intended to use an item that does not exist in the inventory
    Item
    A usable item that can be applied to a monster to produce a variety of result
    Item.FullRestore
    FullRestore restores health to full regardless if monster is fainted or not
    Item.NoEffectException
    Signals that an item has been applied to a monster but produce no result
    Item.Potion
    Potion to heal monsters
    Item.RareCandy
    RareCandy to level up a monster
    Item.Revive
    Revive to heal fainted monsters
    Monster
    An entity that can fight in a battle with a variety of stats
    Monster.Doger
    A speedy boy (Fast, hits pretty good, but might die afterward)
    Monster.Eel
    An eel that can steals health (Heals in battle, but mega slow)
    Monster.Quacker
    A Quacker duck (Jack of all trades)
    Monster.Raver
    A Raver crab (Damage sponge, doesn't fight back well)
    Monster.Shark
    Definitely a shark (Hit hard, if it doesn't die first)
    Monster.Tree
    A Tree, that's it (Long lasting, always in full health before battle)
    Purchasable
    Any class that can be bought and sold into the shop
    Shop
    A shop where you can buy or sell purchasable
    Shop.InsufficientFundsException
    Signals that the buyer does not have sufficient fund to make the purchase
    Shop.NotInStockException
    Signals that the desired purchasable is not available in the Shop at this current state
    Trainer
    AN entity with a party of monsters
    Trainer.MonsterDoesNotExistException
    Signals that the caller has attempted to index a monster that does not exist
    Trainer.PartyFullException
    Signals that add is called when the party reach its maximum size
